org.uclab.mm.icl.hlc.OntologyTools

Class ContextOntology

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.uclab.mm.icl.hlc.OntologyTools.ContextOntology
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    InferredContextOntology

    public class ContextOntology
extends java.lang.Object
    ContextOntology is the class encapsulating the OntModel associated to the Context Ontology which represents the Mining Minds Context Model. This class provides supporting methods to facilitate the access to the Context Ontology.
    Since:
    2015-10-28
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Claudia Villalonga Asif

      • getLlcTypeClass

        public com.hp.hpl.jena.ontology.OntClass getLlcTypeClass(java.lang.String llcTypeName)
        Method to get the subclass of Low Level Context of a given type, e.g. Sitting or Standing for the category Activity.
        Parameters:
        llcTypeName - Name of the type of Low Level Context.
        Returns:
